description: Delicious fresh bruschetta with John West Tuna
name: Tuna Bruschetta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 95g John West Tuna Tempters - Zesty Vinaigrette
1.5 tbs fresh basil, chopped (save 1/2 tbs for garnish)
3 slices sourdough bread, grilled or toasted
75g marinated goat cheese or persian feta

recipeInstructions.text: Combine tomato, capsicum, oil, balsamic vinegar and basil in a small bowl. Season to taste.
Spread grilled bread evenly with goat cheese. Top with tomato mixture followed by John West Tuna. Garnish with basil leaves and serve immediately.
